content.title: Sub-concept Title 1
content.intro: Learn about how different animals perceive the world around them.
content.summary: This section covers the various ways animals use their senses to navigate their environment.

content.title: Bird and Animal Vision
content.intro: Discover how birds and animals have evolved different types of vision.
content.summary: Birds and animals have various vision capabilities that affect how they interact with their world.
content.takeAway: Vision is key to survival in the animal kingdom.
